body.p: Covington, Kentucky, commonwealth's attorney. Cincinnati, Ohio, native. Son of William Arthur and Eliza Parsons Arthur. Studied law under John White Stevenson and James T. Morehead. Admitted to the bar in 1850. Married to Adeliza Southgate Arthur in 1855. Attorney in Covington in 1860. Married to Ethalinda Southgate Arthur in 1861. Commonwealth's attorney for the Ninth Judicial District from 1856 to 1861. Appointed a criminal judge for the Ninth Judicial District from 1866 to 1868.
